name: 2-1B's Touch
effect: Remove up to 3 damage counters from one of your opponent's units. For each damage counter you remove from that unit, remove 1 damage counter from one of your units.

name: 4-LOM (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from your hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Bounty: Remove all damage counters from one of your units. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)
Reserves: Tap -> One of your Characters gets Accuracy 1 for this attack.

name: Admiral Firmus Piett (C)
effect:
Each of your Space units gets "Pay 0 Force -> Intercept."
Pay 1 Force -> Retreat Piett. Play only when no unit is attacking and only if you have a Dark Jedi in any arena.

name: AT-AT
effect:
Armor
Whenever this unit attacks, your opponent may have the defending unit retreat. Damage from this unit can't be prevented.

name: Bantha Herd
effect:
Upkeep: Discard 1 card or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
As long as this unit has a Pilot on it, it gets +20 speed and +2 power.

name: Base Guards
effect: This unit gets +2 power and Armor as long as you have a Location in the Ground arena.

name: Bespin Cloud Car Squad
effect:
Accuracy 1
When the Ground battle step starts, your opponent may pay 3 Force. If he or she does, tap this unit.
This unit gets -1 power for each damage counter on it.

name: Bespin Patrol Cloud Car
effect:
Accuracy 1
When the Ground battle step starts, your opponent may pay 1 Force. If he or she does, tap this unit.

name: Big Asteroid
effect:
Big Asteroid doesn't count toward controlling the Space arena.
When this unit is discarded from the Space arena, you may search your deck, your hand, and/or your discard pile for up to 2 Medium Asteroid cards and put them into the Space arena. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Boba Fett (C)
effect: Bounty: 2 build points (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)

name: Boba Fett (D)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from your hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Armor
Bounty: Tap one of your opponent's untapped Characters. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)

name: Boba Fett (E)
effect:
Armor
As long as Boba Fett is in the Character arena, each of your opponent's Bounty Hunters gets -20 speed.

name: Boba Fett (F)
effect:
Armor
Patrol Ship Pilot. The Patrol Ship gets:
* +20 speed.
* Pay 2 Force -> Deflect 1
* Bounty: Look at your opponent's hand and choose one of those cards. Your opponent discards that card.

name: Boba Fett (G)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Armor
Bounty: 1 build point. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)
Your opponent loses 1 Force for each point of damage done by Boba Fett.

name: Bossk (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from you hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Armor
Bounty: Search your opponent's deck for each card with the same name as the Character that you gained this bounty for. Put those cards in his or her discard pile. Then your opponent shuffles his or her deck. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)
Critical Hit 2

name: C-3PO (G)
effect: Tap -> If C-3PO is untapped, you may tap C-3PO to pay the Upkeep costs of one of your units. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)

name: Call for Hunters
effect:
To complete Call for Hunters, tap one of your untapped units in the Character arena.
Search your deck. You may take up to 4 Bounty Hunter cards from your deck, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Chewbacca (H)
effect:
Retaliate X, where X is Chewbacca's power.
Pay 3 Force -> Intercept

name: Chewbacca (I)
effect: Retaliate X, where X is Chewbacca's power. If Chewbacca’s Retaliate attack causes a unit to be discarded, untap Chewbacca.

name: Cloud City Wing Guard
effect:
Accuracy 1
This unit gets +2 power as long as Lando Calrissian is in any arena.
When the Ground battle step starts, your opponent may pay 3 Force. If he or she does, tap this unit.

name: Commander Nemet (A)
effect:
When your draw step starts, look at the top card of your opponent's deck. You may put that card into your opponent's discard pile.
Capital Ship Pilot. The Capital Ship gets:
* +10 speed.
* +1 power.

name: Dantooine System
effect: Discard this Location from the Space arena -> Your tapped Space units can't be attacked this turn.

name: Dark Sacrifice
effect: Pay 2 Force, Discard one of your units from any arena -> Each of your other units in that arena gets +X power until end of turn, where X equals the discarded unit’s build cost. Play only when no unit is attacking.

name: Darth Vader (L)
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Evade 3
When Vader attacks, set aside the top 3 cards of your deck face up. You may play any set aside Battle cards as though they were in your hand. At the end of the Character battle step, put the unplayed set aside cards back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Darth Vader (M)
effect:
Each of your units gets "Bounty: Gain 1 Force. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)"
As long as Vader is in the Character arena, each of your Bounty Hunters costs 1 fewer build counter to deploy.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2

name: Dash Rendar (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy 1
Pay 0 Force -> Evade 1
Speeder and Transport Pilot. The Speeder or Transport gets:
* Accuracy 1.
* Pay 0 Force -> Evade 1.

name: Death Star Control Room
effect: Each of your Space units gets Accuracy 1.

name: Dengar (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Put 1 damage counter on Dengar. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Armor
Bounty: Remove all damage counters from Dengar.

name: Disrupting Strike
effect: Pay 1 Force -> Disrupt a Battle card unless your opponent pays 2 Force. (That card has no effect.)

name: Doctor Evazan (A)
effect: Tap -> Choose an untapped unit in the Character arena with a total build cost of 4 or less. Doctor Evazan does 4 dice of damage to that unit. Play only when Doctor Evazan would attack.

name: Dune Sea Krayt Dragon
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Untap this unit. Play only when this unit is attacked.

name: E-3PO (A)
effect: Whenever this unit damages one of your opponent's units, your opponent discards 1 card from his or her hand.

name: Enraged Wampa
effect: As long as this unit is attacking a Creature, it gets Critical Hit 2.

name: Falcon's Needs
effect: Choose one of your opponent's units. That unit gets "Upkeep: Pay 2 build points or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)" until the game ends.

name: Garindan (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from your hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Bounty: Look at your opponent's hand and choose one of those cards. Your opponent discards that card. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)

name: Greedo (B)
effect:
Upkeep: Discard 1 card or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy -1
Bounty: Draw 2 cards. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)

name: Guri (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from your hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Bounty: One of your Characters gets "Pay 2 Force -> Untap this unit." until end of turn.

name: Han Solo (H)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy 1
When Han is attacked, predict the number of hits that will be done to Han after damage prevention. If you're correct, gain 3 Force.

name: Han Solo (I)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 2 build points or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy 1
When Han's attack ends, you and your opponent each roll a die. If you roll higher, untap Han.

name: Han's Sacrifice
effect: Discard one of your damaged units from any arena -> Untap one of your units in that arena.

name: Het Nkik (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Remove a card in your discard pile from the game or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Each of your Jawas, including Het, gets +1 power and "Bounty: Put a Droid card from your hand into its arena tapped. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)"

name: Holoprojection Chamber
effect: Each of your Mission cards costs 1 fewer build counters to complete.

name: Hound's Tooth (A)
effect:
Shields 1
When the Space battle step starts, if Hound's Tooth doesn't have a Pilot, Hound's Tooth gets the Pilot abilities of one of your Pilots in the Character arena until end of turn.

name: Human Shield
effect: Pay 6 Force -> Whenever one of your Characters would be damaged this turn, prevent that damage. For each point of damage dealt by an attacking Character that is prevented this way, put 1 damage counter on that attacking Character.

name: IG-2000 (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Discard 1 card or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
IG-2000 can be piloted only by Droids.
Armor
Critical Hit 2
When the Space battle step starts, choose one:
IG-2000 gets +20 speed until end of turn, or
IG-2000 gets +2 power until end of turn.

name: IG-88 (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Tap one of your untapped Droids. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy 1
Bounty: Draw 3 cards.
Critical Hit 2

name: Jabba's Death Mark
effect: When the battle phase starts, choose one of your opponent's units in any arena. If that unit is discarded from that arena this turn, you gain 5 extra build points next turn.

name: Kabe (A)
effect:
Tap -> You may remove a card in your opponent's discard pile from the game. If you do, you gain 1 extra build point next turn. Play only when this unit would attack.
As long as Muftak is in the Character arena, Kabe can't be attacked.

name: Kessel System
effect: Each of your Characters gets "Tap -> Gain 1 extra build point. Play only during your build step."

name: Kyle Katarn (A)
effect:
Treat Kyle Katarn as a Jedi Padawan.
Upkeep: Pay 1 Force or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy 1
Bounty: Gain 2 Force.
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1

name: Lando Calrissian (E)
effect:
Accuracy 1
Tap -> Show your opponent a Bespin unit in your hand. Put that unit into your build zone with up to 4 build counters on it. Play only during your build step.

name: Lando Calrissian (F)
effect:
Tap -> Put the top 2 cards of your deck face down under Lando. (They're not part of his stack.)
Tap -> Put all face-down cards under Lando into your hand.
Your opponent receives no bounty if Lando is discarded from the Character arena.

name: Lando Calrissian (G)
effect:
Lando's speed equals 10 times the number of Bespin units in any arena (including Lando).
Lando's power and health equal the number of Bespin units in any arena (including Lando).

name: Lando System?
effect: Search your deck for a Location card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Lando's Influence
effect: When any Battle step starts, you gain control of one of your opponent's neutral units in that arena. At the end of battle in that arena, return that unit to your opponent.

name: Lando's Trickery
effect: Tap one of your untapped neutral units -> Disrupt a Battle card. (That card has no effect.)

name: Lars Homestead
effect: Each of your units with build cost 5 or less costs 1 fewer build counter to deploy.

name: Leebo (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from your hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Tap -> Remove up to 3 damage counters from a Space or Ground unit. Play only during your build step.

name: Lobot (B)
effect:
Treat Lobot as a Droid.
When you deploy Lobot, search your deck for a Bespin unit and put it into your build zone with 2 build counters on it. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Luke Skywalker (L)
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1
Luke gets +2 power for each other unique Character you have in any arena.

name: Luke's Garage
effect: Each of your Characters gets "Tap -> Remove up to 3 damage counters from a Space or Ground unit. Play only during your build step."

name: Luke's Vow
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Remove damage counters from a Character until that Character is at 1 health. Play only if that Character would be discarded from the Character arena.

name: Luke's X-wing (D)
effect:
Shields 1
As long as Luke's X-wing has a Pilot on it, it gets +3 power.
Each of Luke's X-wing's activated abilities costs 1 less Force to play.

name: Mara Jade (B)
effect:
Treat Mara as a Dark Jedi.
Upkeep: Pay 1 Force or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Bounty: Gain 4 Force. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)
Pay 1 Force -> Deflect 1

name: Medium Asteroid
effect:
Medium Asteroid doesn't count toward controlling the Space arena.
When this unit is discarded from play, you may search your deck, your hand, and/or your discard pile for up to 2 Small Asteroid cards and put them into the Space arena. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

name: Millennium Falcon (H)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
The Millennium Falcon can have an extra Pilot.
When this unit is discarded from the Space arena, you gain 3 extra build points next turn.

name: Millennium Falcon (I)
effect:
The Millennium Falcon can have an extra Pilot.
Accuracy 1
Shields 1
When the build step starts, if the Millennium Falcon isn't piloted by a Wookiee or a Smuggler, tap it.

name: Mist Hunter (A)
effect:
The Mist Hunter can be piloted only by Droids and Bounty Hunters.
Shields 1
The Mist Hunter gets Accuracy 1 as long as it's attacking a damaged unit.

name: Modal Nodes (A)
effect: Tap, Discard Modal Nodes from the Ground arena -> Tap each other unit in the Ground arena. Play only when Modal Nodes would attack.

name: Mos Eisley
effect: When you would draw a card during your draw step, instead name a card type (Space, Ground, Character, Battle, Location, or Mission). Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a card of that type. Put that card into your hand and the other revealed cards into your discard pile.

name: Mos Eisley Cantina
effect: When your build step starts, choose one of your Characters. You don't have to pay that Character's Upkeep costs this turn.

name: Muftak (A)
effect: Tap -> Your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. Play only when Muftak would attack.

name: No Good to Me Dead
effect: Each of your opponent's units receive no Bounty this turn.

name: Ord Mantell System
effect: Each of your Bounty Hunters costs 1 fewer build counter to deploy.

name: Outrider (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from your hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy 1
Shields 1

name: Ponda Baba (A)
effect: Whenever this unit attacks, it must attack the unit with the lowest power among the units it can attack. If more than one unit is tied for lowest power, you choose which one it attacks.

name: Prince Xizor (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 3 build points or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
As long as Xizor is in the Character arena, you don't have to pay the Upkeep costs of your other neutral units. Each of those neutral units gets +10 speed and +1 power.
Whenever Prince Xizor is attacked, prevent all but 2 of that damage.

name: Princess Leia (I)
effect:
Tap -> Each of your Characters gets Accuracy 1. Play only during your build step.
Tap -> You gain 2 extra build points. Play only during your build step.
As long as Leia is in the Character arena, you don't have to pay the Upkeep costs of your Smugglers.

name: Punishing One (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Armor

name: R2-D2 (H)
effect:
Any Starfighter with R2-D2 on it can have an extra Pilot if that Pilot isn't an Astromech Droid.
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* +10 speed.
* +1 power.
* At the start of the Space battle step, remove 1 damage counter from the Starfighter.

name: Redoubled Effort
effect: Choose one of your Characters. You may use one of that Character's activated abilities 1 extra time for this attack.

name: Slave I (D)
effect: Slave I can attack Space units in your opponent's build zone.

name: Slave I (E)
effect:
Accuracy 1
Each of your Bounty Hunters gets "Pay 2 Force -> Retreat this unit."

name: Slave I (F)
effect:
Accuracy 1
Tap, Remove a Space unit in your opponent's discard pile from the game -> You gain 3 extra build points. Play only during your build step.

name: Sleen
effect:
Tap -> Your opponent puts the top card of his or her deck into his or her discard pile. Play only during your build step.
When this unit is discarded from play, your opponent puts the top X cards of his or her deck into his or her discard pile, where X is your Force total.

name: Small Asteroid
effect: Small Asteroid doesn't count toward controlling the Space arena.

name: Space Slug
effect:
Armor
Tap -> Tap one of your opponent's untapped units in the Space arena with health 5 or less. Play only when this unit would attack.
You may choose not to untap this unit during your untap step. Your opponent's unit remains tapped as long as this unit is tapped.

name: Star Destroyer
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point, discard 1 card from your hand, or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
As long as Darth Vader is in any arena, this unit gets "Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 3."

name: Stinger (A)
effect:
Shields 1
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept
When Stinger is discarded from the Space arena, if it had a Pilot on it, move that Pilot to the Character arena tapped instead of discarding it.

name: Stormtrooper Detachment
effect:
Armor
This unit gets +2 power as long as it's attacking neutral units.

name: Streets of Tatooine
effect: Each of your neutral Ground units and neutral Characters gets "Pay 1 Force -> Retreat this unit. Play only when no unit is attacking."

name: Take a Prisoner
effect: Search your opponent's deck. Put up to 4 Character cards with the same name into his or her discard pile. Then your opponent shuffles his or her deck.

name: Tatooine Desert
effect:
Each Tatooine unit costs 1 fewer build counter to deploy.
Each non-Tatooine Ground unit gets -20 speed.

name: TIE Fighter
effect:
Accuracy 1
When this unit is discarded from the Space arena, you gain 1 extra build point next turn.

name: Trash Compactor
effect: When the Character battle step starts, put 1 damage counter on each unit in the Character arena.

name: Tusken Warrior
effect: Damage from this unit's attack can't be prevented.

name: Ugnaught
effect: Tap, Discard this unit from the Character arena -> Return 5 cards from your discard pile to your deck. Then shuffle your deck. Play only during your build step.

name: Unmodified Snowspeeder
effect: Upkeep: Put 1 damage counter on this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)

name: Vendetta
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Prevent all damage to one of your Characters. Until end of turn, damage from that Character's attack can't be prevented and that Character gets +X power, where X is the amount of damage prevented.

name: Virago (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your discard pile. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Armor
When the Space battle step starts, choose one:
Virago gets +20 speed until end of turn, or
Virago gets +2 power until end of turn.

name: X-wing Escort
effect:
Accuracy 1
Shields 1
This unit gets +2 power as long as you have another Starfighter in the Space arena.

name: Yoda (I)
effect:
2 Force pay -> Evade 2
During your build step once, the cards in one of your other unique Character's stacks rearrange you may, without spending any build points.

name: Yoda's Lesson
effect:
Pay 4 Force -> Draw 2 cards.
When one of your opponent's effects causes you to discard this card from your hand, you may draw 3 cards.

name: Zuckuss (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Pay 1 build point or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Accuracy 1
Bounty: Put the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck into his or her discard pile. (When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, you gain the bounty when your next build step starts.)

name: Zutton (A)
effect:
Upkeep: Discard 1 card from your hand or tap this unit. (Pay Upkeep when your build step starts.)
Tap -> Draw 2 cards. Play only during your build step.
